subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Sidney Crosby scored his second goal in two playoff games halfway through the third period to lift the Pittsburgh Penguins to a 4-3 victory against the Ottawa Senators, evening their first-round series at 1-1.
snippet: Sidney Crosby scored his second goal in two playoff games halfway through the third period to lift the Pittsburgh Penguins to a 4-3 victory against the Ottawa Senators, evening their first-round series at 1-1.
